channel.title: CVE Feed for fatcatapps -- Landing Page Cat – Coming Soon Page, Maintenance Page & Squeeze Pages
channel.description: The latest CVEs for fatcatapps -- Landing Page Cat – Coming Soon Page, Maintenance Page & Squeeze Pages

item.title: CVE-2024-0708|2024-08-01T18:11:35.824Z -- fatcatapps -- landing%20page%20cat%20%E2%80%93%20coming%20soon%20page%2C%20maintenance%20page%20%26%20squeeze%20pages
item.description: The Landing Page Cat – Coming Soon Page, Maintenance Page & Squeeze Pages plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.7.2. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to access landing pages that may not be public.

item.title: CVE-2024-0708|2024-06-04T17:58:33.616Z -- fatcatapps -- landing%20page%20cat%20%E2%80%93%20coming%20soon%20page%2C%20maintenance%20page%20%26%20squeeze%20pages
item.description: The Landing Page Cat – Coming Soon Page, Maintenance Page & Squeeze Pages plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.7.2. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to access landing pages that may not be public.
